last_episode_to_air.name: I’ll Wait in My Place
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jin Hyuk tells his mother that he understands why she asked Soo Hyun to break up with him and that he loves her very much. Jin Hyuk comes to understand Soo Hyun and decides to wait for her. One day, Soo Hyun receives a gift from Jin Hyuk.

name: Encounter
overview: It all started with an encounter between a young, ordinary man and a woman whose life has been designed by her influential parents. May it be fate or sheer coincidence, it was a picturesque sunset-lit evening in Cuba that brought them together. And as if they were put under a spell, they were drawn to each other despite the hardships and agony that they were meant to face inevitably. To those around them, the man’s actions and words may seem like nothing but of a young, foolish man’s youthful infatuation, but to them, it is love.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Following a chance encounter overseas, a woman with much to lose and a man with little to his name meet again as employer and employee.

tagline: Sometimes I look at you and wonder how I got to be so lucky.

episodes.name: Enchanted
episodes.overview: After getting the divorce she wanted, Soo Hyun devoted her life into making her hotel successful. It was so successful that she earned the chance to open a branch in Cuba. After attending the opening ceremony, she visits Malecon Beach and has a magical encounter.

episodes.name: We Sincerely Welcome You
episodes.overview: Upon his arrival, Jin Hyuk gets a surprising phone call telling him that he got the job at Donghwa Hotel. He is perplexed by the fact that the woman he spent a romantic day with in Cuba is actually the CEO of the hotel. On Jin Hyuk’s first day at work, he meets Soo Hyun again.

episodes.name: Yearning
episodes.overview: With Soo Hyun’s mother and ex-mother-in-law on the same boat, Soo Hyun fights a lonely battle. She asks for Woo Suk’s help so that Jin Hyuk won’t get hurt. With a heavy heart, Soo Hyun goes on a business trip to Sokcho.

episodes.name: That's Why I'm Trying to Stop
episodes.overview: Jin Hyuk approaches Soo Hyun with sincerity and honesty, but Soo Hyun is afraid of the consequences her actions will bring. She tries to push him away, but it isn’t easy. Chairwoman Kim plans to bring Soo Hyun down from the CEO position, and an anonymous posting on the in-house bulletin board get people talking.

episodes.name: I’m Good at Holding Back
episodes.overview: Everyone is confused and shocked by Jin Hyuk’s bold actions. Hye In, who’s had feelings for Jin Hyuk from a long time ago, is heartbroken as well. Mi Jin worries for her friend’s future and tells Jin Hyuk a little bit about Soo Hyun.

episodes.name: It’s Already Spring for Us
episodes.overview: With the opening ceremony coming up for the hotel in Sokcho, everybody is busy with work. Soo Hyun is surrounded by enemies, but that makes her feel even closer to Jin Hyuk. At the hotel opening ceremony, Soo Hyun witnesses Hwa Jin giving Jin Hyuk a hard time.

episodes.name: Sudden Personnel Appointment
episodes.overview: Even after Soo Hyun's confession at the press conference in Sokcho that shocked the public, Soo Hyun and Jin Hyuk continue to date. However, by Chairwoman Kim's order, Jin Hyuk is told to be transferred to a local branch in Sokcho. He argues that being relocated due to his relationship with Soo Hyun is unfair.

episodes.name: Party Must Go On
episodes.overview: Soo Hyun tells Jin Hyuk that she can help him stay in the head office, but Jin Hyuk refuses her offer saying that he should show people how he comes back to the head office all by himself. Meanwhile, Donghwa Hotel’s year-end party is held as planned. Myung Sik and Sun Joo plan to invite Soo Hyun and Jin Hyuk who has been transferred to Sokcho without telling the two of them so that the young couple has a surprise reunion at the party.

episodes.name: Don’t Be Afraid
episodes.overview: Jin Hyuk and Soo Hyun spend a magical night together on New Year’s Day. However, they become the target of gossip once again after making the headlines. Aware of how Taegyeong will react, Soo Hyun decides to take them head on. However, both Jin Hyuk and Soo Hyun soon realize that they are about to face a big storm.

episodes.name: It Proves That I Was the First to like You
episodes.overview: Soo Hyun and Jin Hyuk reunite after a month passes. Jin Hyuk’s reputation within the office goes up and Soo Hyun feels proud of him, but she is soon faced with an imminent crisis when Jin Chul executes his plan to bring Soo Hyun down.

episodes.name: My Heart Is Full of You
episodes.overview: Jin Hyuk returns to the PR team after sorting out the problem in Cuba. Jin Hyuk and Soo Hyun make precious memories together and become more fond of each other. Meanwhile, Jin Chul receives an unexpected text message from Woo Suk

episodes.name: I Cherish You Very Much
episodes.overview: The shareholders’ meeting takes place and Woo Suk introduces himself as the Co-CEO of Donghwa Hotel. When Woo Suk and Jin Hyuk meet at the office, Jin Hyuk questions Woo Suk’s integrity. Meanwhile, the death anniversary of Soo Hyun’s former father-in-law approaches.

episodes.name: I Can No Longer Live Without You
episodes.overview: To everyone’s surprise, Soo Hyun shows up for dinner at Jin Hyuk’s house. The aftermath is severe and Chairwoman Kim orders Jin Chul to hold a board meeting so that she can bring Soo Hyun down from the CEO position. Soo Hyun decides to get to the bottom of the Cuban hotel incident.

episodes.name: It’s Your First Love Too
episodes.overview: Soo Hyun worries that she’ll end up hurting Jin Hyuk by continuing to see him, but at the same time, she doesn’t want things to end. Jin Myung gets in a fight when he hears his friend badmouthing his brother. After much thought, Soo Hyun makes up her mind.

episodes.name: I’m Sorry
episodes.overview: In order to protect his daughter from Taegyeong, Congressman Cha makes a confession that will bring inevitable consequences. Jin Hyuk wishes to stay by Soo Hyun’s side and keep her safe, but Soo Hyun breaks up with him after much consideration. Jin Hyuk can’t let her go just yet.

episodes.name: I’ll Wait in My Place
episodes.overview: Jin Hyuk tells his mother that he understands why she asked Soo Hyun to break up with him and that he loves her very much. Jin Hyuk comes to understand Soo Hyun and decides to wait for her. One day, Soo Hyun receives a gift from Jin Hyuk.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Following a chance encounter overseas, a woman with much to lose and a man with little to his name meet again as employer and employee.
